settings.heading: For all skin types
settings.testimonial: I couldn't be happier with the results
settings.author: Sandy, 57
settings.content:
“When I tried the Solawave I didn't know what to expect. Using it daily was
easy though and it quickly became a simple addition to my skincare routine.
Over the last 30 days, I've definitely seen a positive change in my skin tone
and texture. I couldn't be happier with the results!”
